snippet: Mose Allison, Lou Donaldson, Lorraine Gordon and Eddie Palmieri are being recognized for their lifetime achievements and significant contributions to the development and performance of jazz.
abstract: Mose Allison, Lou Donaldson, Lorraine Gordon and Eddie Palmieri are being recognized for their lifetime achievements and significant contributions to the development and performance of jazz.

headline.main: National Endowment for the Arts Names Four Jazz Masters for 2013
headline.print_headline: A New Crop of Jazz Masters
